# crypter
A simple encryption library for encryption and decryption.


## Usage
```Python
>>> from crypter import Crypter

>>> c = Crypter(["key1", "secret1", "crypter"])

>>> c.encrypt("1234")
b''

>>> c.decrypt("QDE2M0AxNjNAMTc2QDE2OUAxODBAMTUwQDE2N0AxNDdAMTc4QDE3MEAxNjVAMTY2QDE2NUAxNjNAMTUzQDE3MEAxODVAMTYxQDE3MEAxNTRAMTc4QDE0OEAxNjhAMTc0QDE3NkAxNjVAMTQ5QDE2NEAxNjNAMTYzQ
... DE3NUAxNjRAMTgwQDE1MEAxNjhAMTUyQDE3OEAxNzBAMTY0QDE3MkAxNjVAMTYzQDE1M0AxNzFAMTg1QDE2MUAxNjlAMTUwQDE3OEAxNDhAMTcwQDE2OUAxNzZAMTczQDE1N0AxNzhAMTQ4QDE2OEAxNzJAMTc2QDE2NUAxNTRAM
... TYy")
b'1234'
```
